desc: A charged mineral fragment from the mines.
lore:
A charged mineral fragment from the mines. This one contains a small amount of static electricity.
The mines outside of town were host to all manners of minerals, and many were useful—even crucial—as exports to keep the economy afloat. However, mining joltstone is a delicate task, as careless work could set off the charge within, culminating in a large explosion.
name: Joltstone
